title: Chicken Soup with Egg and Lemon (Avgolemono)

ingredients.content: 100 g potatoes, cut in pieces (1-2 cm)
1 celery stalk, cut in pieces (2 cm)
2 vegetable stock cubes (for 0.5 l each), crumbled
40 g lemon juice, freshly squeezed (approx. 1 lemon)
1 sprig fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place water in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket then weigh in chicken wings, potatoes and onions. Add carrot, celery, vegetable stock, oil, salt and pepper then cook <b>40 min/100°C/speed 2<b>. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Transfer cooked chicken to a bowl and set aside to cool slightly. Discard cooked vegetables.
Remove cooked chicken meat from bones then discard skin and bones. Place shredded chicken meat in a large bowl and cover with foil to keep warm.
Add rice to stock in mixing bowl and cook <b>15 min/100°C//speed <b>. Drain rice through simmering basket over a bowl, reserving stock, and set aside. Add rice to bowl with chicken.
Place a jug on mixing bowl lid and weigh in 250 g reserved stock. Add remaining stock to chicken and rice then cover to keep warm. Clean mixing bowl.
Place egg in mixing bowl and mix <b>30 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add lemon juice and mix <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>.

Without measuring cup, mix <b>20 sec/speed 2<b>, slowly adding reserved stock through hole in mixing bowl lid until combined and frothy. Transfer lemon mixture to bowl with chicken and rice then gently combine. Divide between serving bowls, garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: The method used in <b>step 1<b> is a simple, fuss-free way to make stock in your Thermomix, simply discarding the vegetables at the end of the cooking time.
